snippet: The departure of Angela Knight comes as the financial industry is facing a major overhaul in how it operates and as the association itself is coming under scrutiny over how the London interbank offered rate, or Libor, is set.
abstract: The departure of Angela Knight comes as the financial industry is facing a major overhaul in how it operates and as the association itself is coming under scrutiny over how the London interbank offered rate, or Libor, is set.

headline.main: Head of British Bankers' Association to Step Down
